TopicTitle: The Official HypeTrain 0.90 Voyage Thread (Experimentals! Choo Choo Dangit!)

Articles.Content:
Wait, how did Kasper post it with your profile, Gregrox?!?

And I just realized that the first post is from days ago... Interesting.
No no no, this time it is the HYPE PLANE!

And I just realized that the first post is from days ago... Interesting.

Illuminati confirmed

Hello! May I merge HypePacific Railway Co. with you?

EDIT:Got confirmation from the boss i am offically merged. I tracked down him,he was at Walt disney world...

No you didn't.
So we're Go for Zed-dot-Ninety-dot-Nought? Hype On!

No you didn't.

Yes i did... I can track anyone down with my new hypetrain scanner,it can track ANYONE down,except dead people though... or ghosts

No no no, this time it is the HYPE PLANE!

READ IT: "And what of the HypePlane? JediAerospace has allied with HypeRailways, and thus the HypePlane service is still available, if you want. (but remember, the HypeTrain won the race to 0.25.0.)"

Also:

Yes i did... I can track anyone down with my new hypetrain scanner,it can track ANYONE down,except dead people though... or ghosts

The Boss is just something I made up. He's not real. So no, you can not merge HypePacific with HypeRailways. It wouldn't be a practical business decision.

- - - Updated - - -

But guys, we can't take the whole roleplaying aspect too far.

- - - Updated - - -

No.

Yes indeed.

Goodness yes, experimentals!

READ IT: "And what of the HypePlane? JediAerospace has allied with HypeRailways, and thus the HypePlane service is still available, if you want. (but remember, the HypeTrain won the race to 0.25.0.)"

Aw, come on, why don't we combine the two and make a Hype-TrainPlane? The .24 model is still lying around to be used:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YRXgFu3RpYk?t=2m50s

Dear GregroxMun,

Here is your new favorite thread of all time.

On The Rocketry Forum, user Daddyisabar is creating a bona fide train model rocket! It takes off vertically! It has questionable stability! It has that classy '30s Art Deco styling!

...and yes, it will fly soon.

Here's an image of the completed train.

It is the closest thing to a Hype Train that I have ever seen. Should I ask the Daddy if the KSP Forum could use it as the official Hypetrain?

-Upsilon
What?! The Hype train isn't a PRR-S1? This is heresy!

Dear GregroxMun,

Here is your new favorite thread of all time.

On The Rocketry Forum, user Daddyisabar is creating a bona fide train model rocket! It takes off vertically! It has questionable stability! It has that classy '30s Art Deco styling!

...and yes, it will fly soon.

Here's an image of the completed train.

http://i.imgur.com/ftehVWE.jpg

It is the closest thing to a Hype Train that I have ever seen. Should I ask the Daddy if the KSP Forum could use it as the official Hypetrain?

-Upsilon

It's not the official HypeTrain, that's for sure, but it's tha darn-best model HypeTrain I've ever seen. I am insanely happy right now at this rocket.

This shall be a great launch. I can tell.

*goes and retrieves all of the straight pieces of model train track left in the storage wagon, and prepares to but a rocket motor on a train wagon.
Yayyyy hypee

What?! The Hype train isn't a PRR-S1? This is heresy!

The aerodynamic coverup just adds extra weight. The Gresley A3 is a far classier class of locomotive anyway, imho.

Goodness yes, experimentals!

Aw, come on, why don't we combine the two and make a Hype-TrainPlane? The .24 model is still lying around to be used:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YRXgFu3RpYk?t=2m50s

I have plans. Wait for it. The train returns for 0.90. But we keep it secret.

The aerodynamic coverup just adds extra weight. The Gresley A3 is a far classier class of locomotive anyway, imho.

Wait, the front of the train like that is just an aerodynamic shell? I feel cheated.
That Hype Plane teaser was awesome, Space Scumbag.

Oh my god, experimentals came as a surprise! Nothing... nothing... and then... HYYYPPPEEE BLAAAASSTTOOOOOFFFFF

By the way, how did Gregrox time this so precisely?
Sweet! I knew living in the Hype Train for the past 2 months would pay off eventually!

Goodness yes, experimentals!

Aw, come on, why don't we combine the two and make a Hype-TrainPlane? The .24 model is still lying around to be used:

Refer to my signature

What are the planned features of 0.90.0?

Kerbal Experience - Using the created experience tracking system, Kerbals are now getting traits. These traits will level up as they partake in missions and accomplish goals, increasing the unique passive bonuses each Kerbal will be generated with.

...

Piloting by Kerbals - Kerbals can do basic piloting, such as holding a certain heading or pointing at a maneuver node. What a Kerbal can do is defined by his/her* experience.

I got the impression the "Pilot" skills were a role skillset, and that role got the sequential skills (we saw icons for) as that astronaut with that role gained experience. Along with there being a rumoured "Engineer" role, with its own skillset, etc.

Is that not the case?

edit: I mean I hope that's the case, and Squad didn't still end up going with the D&D part-buff plan that started the original riots.
I've been waiting at the station since the new MK. III parts were revealed. That and the useful adaptors. GIMMEH MEH TEEKAT! *shower of Funds*

I have plans. Wait for it. The train returns for 0.90. But we keep it secret.

Ah, your train replica. Pretty neat, but not accurate. the 0.24 HypeTrain (and 0.25) was a Black Five locomotive.

Now it's a Gresley A3.
